name: Dice Machine (Noobc0re)
description:
Get to 1000 points to win!

Press the button with the R to roll the dice.

Use the 1x or 10x button to buy points, dice or multipliers. If you can't afford 10, the 10x button will buy as many as you can afford.

Bonus points, single use dice and multipliers reset after each roll.

I decided to skip sounds as I did not have enough time to not make it sound awful!

I was going to give options to keep playing or resetting after reaching 1000 points, but unfortunately we don't yet have the technology for that...apparently!
